messages.message: Based on the data shown in Grafana, multiple services have one pod that’s using almost all CPU power. This looks like the same problem that I found on Friday. cc <!subteam^SQ9BZ7S2Y> @Shubham Oli Let’s quarantine those pods first to alleviate this problem for now, and try our best to figure out what causes it. I’ll DM people to get this started, will update here.
@Kerry, restart the pods for now.  Given the the problem happens quite frequently, we should be able to reproduce this locally.
cool @shaunak, i’ll let you guys take over. this is becoming quite frequent indeed. Shubham and I did some investigation, he can update you what we found.

@Kerry we still need your help in consistently reproducing the problem.  Can you formulate the exact set of steps that gets at least apps-server in this configuration?  We can take it over from there.
